definition: cave/hole/zero (unambiguous spoken form when spelling out numbers)/CL:個|个[ge4]
"water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]
Dongkou county in Shaoyang 邵陽|邵阳[Shao4 yang2], Hunan
Dongkou county in Shaoyang 邵陽|邵阳[Shao4 yang2], Hunan
Dongting Lake in northeast Hunan province
yaodong (a kind of cave dwelling in the Loess Plateau in northwest China)/CL:孔[kong3]

sentences.chinese: 他在18洞的高爾夫賽程中得了85杆的成績。

sentences.english: The boy scooped out a hole in the sand .
sentences.chinese: 那個男孩在沙中挖了個洞。

sentences.english: First, I cut an access hole in the Bridge Deck and glued the Wheelhouse to it.
sentences.chinese: 首先，我削減一進入洞，在橋面和膠合板舵手給它。

sentences.english: The water has penetrated into the bedroom, so there must be a hole in the roof.
sentences.chinese: 水已經進入臥室，所以肯定在房頂上有洞。

sentences.english: Use a lighter to burn a hole in the middle of each Scindapsus aureus leaf.
sentences.chinese: 把一盆綠蘿的葉子中央都用打火機燒一個洞。

sentences.english: I managed to bung up the hole in the ceiling with some paper.
sentences.chinese: 我用一些紙極力把天花板的洞塞住。

sentences.english: The train conductor punched my ticket.
sentences.chinese: 火車檢票員在我的車票上軋洞。

sentences.english: The Altamira Cave consists of a series of rooms and passages shaped like anS.
sentences.chinese: 阿爾塔米拉洞包括的一系列房間和塑造象像S型。

sentences.english: In other words, avoid the left side of the entire hole.
sentences.chinese: 總之，你應該儘量避開洞的整個左側區域。

sentences.english: An organic sculpture, covered with a shiny silver color, will be designed as a natural cave in the middle of the shop.
sentences.chinese: 閃亮耀目的銀面有機大造形在中廳創造出天然的洞。

sentences.english: The animal was lured out of its hole.
And looking into it, he saw a flight of stone stairs.
sentences.chinese: 向洞內望去，見有一道石級。

sentences.english: Keeps thee here in dark to be his paramour?
sentences.chinese: 把你藏在這暗洞裏做他的情婦？

sentences.english: When I come home, I rest in the holes on the broken wall of the well.
sentences.chinese: 當我回到家時，我在破井邊的洞裏面休息。

sentences.english: It has many "holes" that allow spyware to infiltrate your system.
sentences.chinese: 它有很多“洞”可以讓間諜軟件滲透到你的系統裏面。

sentences.english: The main arch's main hole and the both sides abdomen arch the eyelet is 20 red stone arches juxtaposes becomes.
sentences.chinese: 主拱的主孔和雙方的腹拱洞裏形成並排20紅石拱門。

definition: Dongkou county in Shaoyang 邵陽|邵阳[Shao4 yang2], Hunan
chisel/to bore a hole/to chisel or dig/(literary) (bound form) certain/authentic/irrefutable/also pr. [zuo4]
